title: Is white hat Jr free for students? - Quora

response.answer_text: No. Its a paid course…you get a free demo class…And then you will have a course of 36 classes….its a bit expensive….. But u should go for it because it will become an essential skill in a few years…. And you might have an edge over other people in any perspective..
No, sadly it’s not free. U have to pay something like 50 dollars. U can learn coding from youtube . It won’t help as white hat jr does but it should work.
